meanings.definition: Act dishonestly or unfairly in order to gain an advantage.
meanings.sent1: He cheats by peeking at the answers during the test.
meanings.sent2: She cheats in games by using cheat codes.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky raccoon cheats by stealing food from the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The cunning fox cheats death by outsmarting the hunters.
meanings.sent5: The magician cheats the audience with his clever tricks.

meanings.definition: A person who acts dishonestly or unfairly in order to gain an advantage.
meanings.sent1: The cheats were caught red-handed during the competition.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a cheat among her classmates.
meanings.sent3: The little cheat tried to blame his missing homework on the dog.
meanings.sent4: The cheat in the group always finds a way to avoid doing their fair share of work.
meanings.sent5: The cheat's reputation spread quickly throughout the school.
